activities:
D6 is licensed as a Private Investigations company with the State of Texas. 
Our services include: 
      Forensic data collections 
      Computer Forensic Examinations 
      Expert Testimony 
      Complex Data Analysis 
      Transactional data collections and processing  
      Electronic Data Processing 
      Electronic and Paper Discovery collections 
      Data Review Tuning 
      Data Production Consulting 
      Records Retention Policy Review 
      Preservation and Technical Scoping 
      Preservation Methodology Development/Implementation 
      Compliance Testing 
      Contingency Planning
